title: Generic Re-usable Ceramic Coffee Mug with Handle and Removable Lockable Lid with Sliding Sip Hole 400ML. Heatproof Cork Base Design. (Matte Black)
features: Ceramic construction: Elevate your coffee experience with our sleek ceramic travel mug featuring a heatproof cork bottom. This design ensures your desk or furniture remains free from unsightly rings.

Generous capacity: With a large 400ml capacity, our reusable coffee mug holds ample amounts of your favourite brew. This capacity keeps you fueled throughout the day without the need for constant refills.

Lockable removable lid: Enjoy peace of mind with our innovative lockable and removable lid. The ceramic mug’s lid is equipped with a sliding sip hole for easy access to your beverage while preventing spills wherever you are.
Spill-proof: Designed for convenience, our ceramic camping mug boasts a spill-proof construction. This feature allows you to enjoy your coffee without worrying about accidental spills or messes.

Sleek matte minimalist design: Available in sophisticated colour options, our ceramic coffee mug complements any style or personality. It's the perfect accessory for coffee enthusiasts who appreciate functionality and aesthetics.
description: Enjoy your coffee with style and practicality using the thermal mug. This sleek ceramic travel cup is designed to enhance your coffee experience. Its stylish construction includes a heatproof cork bottom that protects your desk or furniture from unsightly rings, adding a touch of sophistication to your routine. The ceramic travel mug has a generous 400ml capacity, perfect for holding ample amounts of your favourite brew. This means you stay fueled throughout the day without needing constant refills. The lockable and removable lid is innovative, featuring a sliding sip hole for easy access to your beverage while preventing spills. Whether you're at your desk or on the go, this ceramic coffee mug with lid offers peace of mind. Designed with convenience in mind, the thermal travel cup is spill-proof, so you can enjoy your coffee without worrying about accidental spills or messes. This feature makes it ideal for commuting or busy mornings. The portable coffee cup is available in sophisticated colour options, to complement any style or personality. It is the perfect accessory for coffee enthusiasts who value both functionality and aesthetics. Made from high-quality ceramic, the small travel mug is durable and built to last. The heatproof cork base not only protects surfaces but also adds an extra layer of insulation, keeping your drink at the perfect temperature for longer. The ceramic coffee mug's minimalist design fits seamlessly into any setting, whether at home, in the office, or on the go. Choosing this mug also means making a responsible choice. By using a reusable coffee thermos mug, you reduce waste and contribute to a healthier planet. It's a small step that makes a big difference. Key features: - Stylish ceramic construction with a heatproof cork bottom - Generous 400ml capacity - Lockable removable lid with sliding sip hole - Spill-proof design for convenience - Sleek matte minimalist design
